name: Reese's Pup
description:
This dog is trapped in the Reese's Puff dungeon. Can he get out? Can he defeat these deliciously deadly snack? I don't know.

Controls (Compatible with controller)

  • WASD or Left joystick to move
  • Use cursor or Right joystick to aim your attack
  • Left click or R1/L1 to attack
  • Right click/Shift or R2/L2 to dodge
  • P to pause

Credits

  • Chloe : Sprites and Programming
  • James : SFX and OST
  • Ansel : Programming
